item.title: COVID-19: sense in a time of non-sense
item.description: COVID-19: sense in a time of non-sense As I watch people around me panic, I thought I’d scribble down the words that I have been reciting to my husband three times a day for the last week. He is an emotional person, like many, and has found it hard to keep a focused, rational thinking process about the situation despite his PhD in Systems Biology, 2 Masters and 2 undergrads.
